title: karpakAmbikE
sahitya:
kapakAmbikE kaDaikkaN pArttenaik-kAttaruL karuNAkari


anupallavi

  arpa bhOga mOham koNDu alai kaDal turumbAvEnai ATkoNDu


caraNam    lajjai ilAmal piccaiyai nAdi ittaraiyil dinam luttaraip-pADi
sajjanar pArpazhi shorkkaL Adi tar-pugazhcci pEshik-kUDAraikkUDik-keDumenaik-
